response.overview: The sloth is nature's champion sluggard; one of the most misunderstood animals in the world. As recently as a century ago, the sloth was regarded as a 'blunder of nature.' To capture this story, the Moody Institute of Science did research in the laboratory and in the jungles of Panama. Reacquaint yourself with the dependability and accuracy of the Scriptures as compared with man's writings.
response.title: Of Books and Sloths
